page.title: 06Needwood School
page.content: Needwood School was once{Rangemore {Hall,}the home of the first{Lord {Burton.} In 1954 Staffordshire County Council opened the Hall as the{Needwood School {for Partially Hearing Children.}The school is set in beautiful grounds and has been a residential school for these children since this time. At one time as many as{120 children}were taught here. Now the life of the school is coming to an end, and it is due to{close down in{August 1985.}All the children have been placed in other schools and the property is to be sold. Everyone is wondering what will happen to this lovely building, erected in 1900, and to what new use it will be put.
